    Michael Ziluck

      • removeTimePattern

        public static String removeTimePattern(String input)
        Removes the time pattern from the given String.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to strip.
        Returns:
        the stripped String.

      • parseDateDiff

        public static long parseDateDiff(String time,
                                 boolean future)
                          throws Exception
        Parse the given time String to a period of time represented with a long. Additionally it has the ability to specify if it was in the past or in the future.
        Parameters:
        time - the time String.
        future - whether or not the time is in the future.
        Returns:
        the parsed period of time.
        Throws:
        Exception - will throw an exception if the given format is wrong.

      • dateDiff

                    Calendar toDate,
                    boolean future)

      • formatDateDiff

        public static String formatDateDiff(long date)
        Calculate and format the difference between the given date and the current time.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to reference.
        Returns:
        the formatted difference in time.

      • formatDateDiff

        public static String formatDateDiff(Calendar fromDate,
                                    Calendar toDate)
        Format the difference between the two given dates.
        Parameters:
        fromDate - the starting date.
        toDate - the ending date.
        Returns:
        the formatted difference in time.
